cast.name: 莉安娜·查密士 Leanna Chamish

this_title: What Happens Next Will Scare You
introduction: Staying late in their office on a Friday night, a motley crew of click-bait article authors are tasked with finding the top thirteen scariest online videos in preparation for a Halloween roll-out. When an early entry promises to curse whoever watches the cryptic link, our snarky writers must distinguish fact from fiction before a crescendo of paranormal disturbances lead to real-life murders.
foreign_title: What Happens Next Will Scare You
